name: All Out? The Neverending Heist
description:
Team

Aaron Chattha | Programmer

Christoph Helch | Producer, Artist, Leveldesigner, Sounddesigner

Dominik Schmidt | ex-Leveldesigner

Philipp Bauer | Programmer

Philipp Carl | Game Designer, Artist

Introduction

„All Out? The Neverending Heist” is a pixel art, top-down dungeon crawler, rogue-lite game, where you play as a robber, that has broken into the vault of a casino. After you’ve gathered everything that’s inside, you need to get through the 4 Stages of the Casino that are peppered with obstacles like cameras and guards, to call the loot your own.
